name: Red Hunger
description:
Date: 22.1.2023

It is here again. The social burnout after a long, long time. These people disgust me. Their behavior... is really selfish and arrogant. They are only complaining about problems that do not exist.

I am feeling hopeless and I think nothing can avoid it. I have only one option... or not?

Note: It is recommended to play this game as a .exe file on Windows.

You can listen to the OST on YouTube here!
